I'd highly recommend watching "The House Bunny" if you're in the mood for a lighthearted comedy of manners! In this film, Anna Faris plays Shelley, who becomes the house mother for a group of socially awkward sorority girls. It's a delightful movie with some great comedic moments and memorable characters.

If you fancy something a bit more dramatic but still within the genre, "White Night" might be an interesting choice. This suspenseful comedy revolves around a cold-case murder investigation by a retiring detective, featuring some captivating performances from its stars. Enjoy your movie night!
